item.title: A KeyDB Operator
item.description: KeyDB is a multithreading, drop-in alternative to Redis. Keydb-operator easily creates a standalone (1 replica) or a multimaster (3 replicas) KeyDB in-memory database. When KeyDB is in multimaster mode, it is possible to have more than one master, allowing read/write operations to all them. That helps for high availability and fault tolerance. Install The Kubernetes Operator in this project is in Alpha version. Use at your own risk Check out the sample CR.
